first_para: 'Rene Claudel Mugenzi' is a British Community and Social Development practitioner; Human Rights Activist, Community Organiser and politician. Rene is the currently Parliamentary Candidate for Poplar and Limehouse in The United Kingdom General Election of 2015 which will be held on 7 May 2015. He is representing the Red Flag Anti-Corruption political party.

He is representing the Red Flag Anti-Corruption political party.
full.title: Rene Claudel Mugenzi
